abstract.t: This document describes a declarative (also called intent based) policymodel to describe the user's intent on network policy. The intent policy model isa specific data model specifies the desired state of the network system. Ithelps the service management in Simplified Use of Policy Abstractions (SUPA) tomodel the policy (a set of states described by constraints) that defines thefinal results of a VPN service without specifying how it is monitored and managed during its lifecycle. One application for Distributed Data Center (DDC) scenarios with policy enforcement is provided with details of how to convert high level intent policy into lower level configurations.
